name: Guess The Word
description: This is a simple and fun word-guessing game where players try to figure out the hidden word based on given hints. Test your vocabulary and thinking skills in this engaging challenge!

featuresContext: Use provided hints to guess the correct word.
Easy-to-use interface for a smooth experience.
Play on any device, from desktop to mobile.
Enjoy a variety of words to keep the game exciting.

name: Dear Diary
description: Dear Diary is a private and minimalistic online journal where you can write and store your thoughts securely. Capture your daily experiences, emotions, and memories in a simple, distraction-free interface.

featuresContext: Your entries are stored safely for personal use.
Clean and minimal design for a smooth writing experience.
Keep track of your thoughts with neatly arranged logs.
Write and review your diary from any device.

name: Flip Match
description: Flip Match is a fun and interactive memory card game where players flip cards to find matching pairs. Test your concentration and memory skills in an engaging and simple gameplay experience.

featuresContext: Sharpen your brain by matching card pairs.
Enjoy a visually appealing and interactive experience.
Choose from different levels for added challenge.
Play seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.
Restart anytime to improve your score and memory skills.

name: Portfolio
description: Portfolio is a clean and professional portfolio showcasing the work of frontend developer Ilhomjon Yusupov. It highlights projects, skills, and experience in web development with a minimal and user-friendly design.

featuresContext: Display of past and current web development projects.
Simple yet effective layout for easy navigation.
Optimized for smooth performance on all devices.
Easy way for clients to reach out for collaborations.
Overview of expertise in frontend technologies.

name: Macbook Replica
description: MacBook Replica is a web-based simulation of a MacBook interface, featuring interactive apps and a sleek UI. Experience a near-authentic MacBook feel directly in your browser.

featuresContext: A visually accurate MacBook-like experience.
Includes Photos, Notes, Photo Booth, Folder, Safari, and Settings.
Seamless transitions and effects for a polished feel.
Adjust settings and explore different features.
Works across various screen sizes and devices.

name: Recall Easily
description: Recall is a flashcard-based memory game where you create topics and add custom flashcards. Test your recall ability by guessing the content of each flashcard before flipping it to check your answer. Itâ€™s a fun and interactive way to reinforce learning and improve memory.

featuresContext: Create and organize flashcards under different topics.
Guess the answer before flipping to reveal it.
Add and manage your own flashcards for any subject.
Clean and easy-to-use design for a smooth experience.
Works on both desktop and mobile devices.

name: Photographer Portfolio
description: James Harrison is a sleek and professional portfolio showcasing photography and videography services. Explore high-quality visuals, browse through past projects, and easily get in touch for bookings.

featuresContext: View a collection of high-quality photos and videos.
A clean and visually appealing layout.
Optimized for smooth performance on all devices.
